title: Rendez-vous France. Episodes 1-5
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation, Susan Paton and Sue Weeks
brief_description: A series of five french language programs based on the adventures of the Keravec family on holiday in Cancale, Brittany. Provides elementary french language and gives an insight into many aspects of life in France. The individual titles indicate the content of each program: “Chez Keravec”, “Les surprises” “Une ombre du passe”, “Les choux-fleurs de Saint-Brieuc”, “La chasse a mort”.
